type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
Vigilance; Exalted
When this creature transforms into Morgan, Brilliant Exalt exile target creature an opponent controls until Morgan leaves the battlefield.
[i]The Fire Emblem[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target nonland card from your graveyard. Create a copy of it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
